segment.source: To ensure that you are connected to the correct central archive, review the configuration of the AGPM Server connection.
segment.target: To ensure that you are connected to the correct central archive, review the configuration of the AGPM Server connection.

segment.source: If an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) has not configured an AGPM Server connection for you, then you must manually configure it.
segment.target: If an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) has not configured an AGPM Server connection for you, then you must manually configure it.

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: In the details pane, click the AGPM Server tab:
segment.target: In the details pane, click the AGPM Server tab:

segment.source: If the options on the AGPM Server tab are unavailable, they have been centrally configured by an AGPM Administrator.
segment.target: If the options on the AGPM Server tab are unavailable, they have been centrally configured by an AGPM Administrator.

segment.source: If the options on the AGPM Server tab are available, type the fully-qualified computer name for the AGPM Server (for example, server.contoso.com) and the port on which the AGPM Service listens (by default, port 4600).
segment.target: If the options on the AGPM Server tab are available, type the fully-qualified computer name for the AGPM Server (for example, server.contoso.com) and the port on which the AGPM Service listens (by default, port 4600).

segment.source: Click Apply, then click Yes to confirm.
segment.target: Click Apply, then click Yes to confirm.

segment.source: The AGPM Servers selected determine which GPOs are displayed on the Contents tab and to what location the Domain Delegation tab settings are applied.
segment.target: The AGPM Servers selected determine which GPOs are displayed on the Contents tab and to what location the Domain Delegation tab settings are applied.

segment.source: If not centrally managed through the Administrative template, each Group Policy administrator must configure this setting to point to the AGPM Server for the domain.
segment.target: If not centrally managed through the Administrative template, each Group Policy administrator must configure this setting to point to the AGPM Server for the domain.
